mash_toggles.title: Ecraser Toggles
mash_toggles.description: Actions à mener dans les plus brefs délais

followup_toggles.title: Déclencheurs de Suivi
followup_toggles.description: Actions à effectuer après une option d'empâtage

mash_triggers.title: Mash Triggers
mash_triggers.description: Configure what causes the cpu to perform a mash option

attack_angle.title: Attack Angle
attack_angle.description: For attacks that can be angled, such as some forward tilts

throw_options.title: Throw Options
throw_options.description: Throw to be performed when a grab is landed

throw_delay.title: Throw Delay
throw_delay.description: How many frames to delay the throw option

pummel_delay.title: Pummel Delay
pummel_delay.description: How many frames after a grab to wait before starting to pummel

falling_aerials.title: Falling Aerials
falling_aerials.description: Should aerials be performed when rising or when falling

full_hop.title: Full Hop
full_hop.description: Should the cpu perform a full hop or a short hop

aerial_delay.title: Aerial Delay
aerial_delay.description: How long to delay a mash aerial attack

fast_fall.title: Fast Fall
fast_fall.description: Should the cpu fastfall during a jump

fast_fall_delay.title: Fast Fall Delay
fast_fall_delay.description: How many frames the cpu should delay their fastfall

oos_offset.title: OoS Offset
oos_offset.description: How many times the cpu shield can be hit before performing a mash option

reaction_time.title: Reaction Time
reaction_time.description: How many frames to delay before performing a mash option
